Kako so se v manjšem podjetju skrajšali čas inventure za polovico?

03 Nov 2019, 07:00


Vodja skladišča Gašper dela v manjšem podjetju z 20-imi zaposlenimi v Kranju, ki se ukvarja z distribucijo izdelkov za zdravo prehrano in prehrambenimi dodatki. Do sedaj so vsa leta opravljali inventuro opravljali s seznami natisnjenimi na papir, letos pa se je Gašper zaradi zamudnosti pri ročnem popisu odločil, da direktorju predlaga modernizacijo v podjetju - digitalni zajem črtnih kod in inventure s mobilnim terminalom in programom PCS.

Izzivi s katerimi so se soočali pri inventuri
Pa poglejmo s kakšnimi izzivi se je soočalo podjetje pred uvedbo bolj efektivnega načina popisa blaga. Prej je bilo v inventurni popis vključeno večino zaposlenih, kar pomeni, da v tem času niso opravljali tekočega dela. S tem je prišlo do izpada dohodka za dan oz. dva, kolikor je trajal popis zalog. Količine iz seznama blaga je eden od zaposlenih potem pretipkal v računovodski program Pantheon. Kar je, brez dvoma, vzelo kar nekaj časa. 
Poleg zelo očitnega prihranka časa, je prej pri vsakoletnem popisu blaga prihajalo še do zamenjave podobnih izdelkov in napak pri štetju zaradi prekinitve popisa med delom. Pri popisu s terminalom ni potrebno iskati izdelkov ter jih ni potrebno zapisovati po točno določenem vrstnem redu,  kot so ti na papirju. To pa znatno olajša popis.
Rezultati bolj efektivnega načina popisa blaga
Z uvedbo rešitve za inventuro ProCodeScan in mobilnega terminala, se je čas popisa občutno skrajšal in optimiziral. Program jim sedaj omogoča branje črtnih kod, vpogled v seznam podatkov po času vnosa in možnost urejanja vnosnih podatkov.  Podatke lahko enostavno izvozijo v računovodsko knjigovodski program. 
Zbrane  podatke iz popisa Gašper in njegovi sodelavci sedaj lahko prenesejo brezžično, preko WI-FI povezave. Podjetje ima vpogled v njihove podatke že tekom dela. Inventuro naredijo hitreje in bolj natančno.  Večina zaposlenih na dneve, ko bi drugače opravljali inventuro, opravlja svoje redne naloge, s tem pa ne prihaja do izpada dohodka. 
Hitra uvedba enostavnejše inventure v vašem podjetju
Želite tudi vi opraviti inventuro hitreje in enostavneje? Program ProCodeScan ( PCS )deluje na Android kot na Windows terminalih in je združljiv z večino računovodskimi in knjigovodskimi programi v Sloveniji (Saop, Birokrat, Pantheon, Adamsoft...). Ste proizvodno podjetje? PCS omogoča tudi vhod in izhod blaga za proizvodna podjetja z LOT kodami / šaržo in serijskimi številkami ter nadzor blaga skozi celotni proizvodni proces. 

Program PCS so pripravili strokovnjaki z 20-letnimi izkušnjami s skladiščnim poslovanjem, popisom blaga in črtnimi kodami. Program izboljšujejo z novimi funkcionalnosmii, na podlagi poslovnih potreb svojih strank. Za več informacij kontaktirajte podjetje Info-kod d.o.o.

How did smaller companies cut inventory time by half?

03 Nov 2019, 07:00


The manager of the Gasper warehouse is working in a small company with 20 employees in Kranj, which is engaged in the distribution of health foods and nutritional supplements. Until now, all the years of inventorying were done with lists printed on paper, and this year, due to the delay in manual census, Gasper decided to propose to the director modernization in the company - digital capture of barcodes and inventories with a mobile terminal and PCS program.

Challenges they faced in inventory
Let's look at the challenges the company faced before introducing a more effective way of inventorying goods. Previously, most employees were included in the inventory, which means that they did not perform current work during that time. This resulted in a loss of income for the day or. two, as long as the inventory lasted. Quantities from the list of goods were then typed into one Pantheon accounting program by one of the employees. Which, no doubt, took quite some time.
In addition to the very obvious saving of time, earlier in the annual inventory of goods, there were also the replacement of similar products and errors in counting due to interruption of the inventory during work. The terminal inventory does not have to search for products and does not have to be written in a specific order, such as those on paper. This makes the inventory much easier.
Results of a more effective way of inventorying goods
With the introduction of the inventory solution for ProCodeScan and the mobile terminal, inventory time has been significantly shortened and optimized. The program now allows them to read barcodes, view the list of data after the time of entry and the ability to edit the input data. They can easily export the data into an accounting accounting program.
The collected data from the Gasper Census and its associates can now be transmitted wirelessly via a WI-FI connection. The company has an insight into their data as they work. They make inventory faster and more accurately. Most employees perform their regular tasks on the days when they would otherwise take inventory, thus not generating a loss of income.
Quick introduction of simpler inventory in your business
Do you want to make inventory faster and easier? ProCodeScan (PCS) software runs on Android like Windows terminals and is compatible with most accounting and bookkeeping programs in Slovenia (Saop, Bureaucrat, Pantheon, Adamsoft ...). Are you a manufacturing company? PCS also enables the entry and exit of goods for manufacturing companies with LOT codes / batches and serial numbers, and control of goods throughout the production process.

The PCS program was prepared by professionals with 20 years of experience in warehousing, inventory and barcodes. They are improving the program with new functionalities based on the business needs of their customers. Contact Info-code d.o.o. for more information.
